author: Cody Redmon
content:
Hey Andreas,

For some reason your latest comment on 'Obstructed Beauty' was held by my spam plugin and I didn't see it until tonight...sorry. Thanks for following up with your image, though, I dig it. I love how the closest fence wires are enlarged due to proximity and their blurred lines create a feeling of being in jail or something. This is a cool presentation of nature in all its beauty within the confines of man's concrete jungle. Looks like the ball's in my court now, Andreas. ðŸ™‚
